title: Interpretation of traveling by plane in a dream: Seeing a plane trip in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a plane for a girl, for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether the plane is riding and falling in the sky, flying a fighter plane, landing a helicopter for a son, but. Level Interpretation of traveling by plane in a dream Traveling by plane in a dream indicates rapid travel and achieving things. It indicates circumstances Changing circumstances and changing social relationships. Boarding a plane can indicate honesty and closeness to God. Traveling by plane indicates a high status, high morals, a high economic and social status, or increased religious commitment and faith. Whoever sees the plane landing will receive guests, goods, or mail from afar. He may receive a relative Or a lover, friend, or person who returned to him after a long separation, and perhaps a child was born to him. Whoever lands on the plane in a dream, his condition stabilizes and he rests after effort, and he may survive a difficult relationship or certain death. Boarding the plane is evidence of a rapid rise in the affairs of worldly life and moral and religious commitment. It represents travel. In a dream, in general, moving from one state to another or from one place to another. Whoever sees that he is traveling and sweeping the earth. Whoever sees that he is sweeping the earth is traveling. Whoever returns from a journey has a duty. Returning from a journey indicates salvation from bad deeds. It also indicates the removal of worries or a person’s repentance from sins and abandoning transgressions. Riding a beast suggests that you will get what you want, glory, and be dominated by others. Whoever rides the best horses will achieve what he wants and will be safe from the temptations of desires. Whoever walks flat will enjoy goodness and apply the rules of Islam. Whoever walks in the market has a will, and whoever walks barefoot shows his good will and comfort. Running on two feet or an animal. It denotes salvation, speed in achieving what one seeks, and safety from what one fears. Anyone who flies over a mountain attains a state where kings submit to him. Whoever sees that he has flown will gain power if he deserves it, and if he lands on something, he will possess it. Flying generally indicates travel if It was with wings. Whoever reaches the end of his journey will achieve goodness in his journey. Whoever flies from one place to another has won honor. Whoever flies from the bottom to the top, his desires will be fulfilled and his stature will rise at his height. Whoever flies in the air like a dove will attain glory, and boarding the plane indicates a distinct and distinguished milieu to which the dreamer belongs. It indicates The aircraft is known to the country of origin or the owners of the aircraft. Military aircraft may indicate God’s blessings or indicate birds. Owning an aircraft involves great responsibility and commitment. An aircraft may indicate a computer mouse arrow as it flies over pages and lands on links. Anyone riding an airplane in a dream will leave the earth or leave people or He dies if he gets sick. Boarding a plane may be evidence of a difficult transition marked by volatility. A plane falling in a dream indicates catastrophes and catastrophes, and military planes indicate aggression and power. He who is not good at riding animals follows his whims, and he who walks barefoot will divorce his wife and afflict her with her affliction. He who rides on a man’s neck will die and carry him. Knight to the Funeral Anyone who flees from God or from the Angel of Death will be judged

If the dreamer sees someone singing in a beautiful voice, this may lead to good things, God willing. When you see Someone singing loudly in a dream, this could be a sign of bad things, and God knows the unseen. It could express failure, and God knows all that is unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about the sea

preview.html: Our article today revolves around the interpretation of seeing the sea in a dream, as seeing the sea in a dream is one of the visions that many people ask about through dream interpretation sites, because the sea in a dream has different meanings. The dreamer herself makes the interpretation of the dream have different meanings. An unmarried pregnant woman is different from a single man. Therefore, during our article today, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a dream about the sea in a dream in its various states, whether it is calm or raging, and whether seeing the coast differs from the sea. Same in detail. Encyclopedia, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about the sea. Jurists and interpreters agreed on the symbolism of seeing the sea in a dream, as it symbolizes a strong and just king who manages the affairs of his flock and his family without fatigue, fatigue, or injustice. Interpretation of the sea view by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that whoever sees the sea in his dream... If it is far away and he cannot approach it or swim in it, it means that he will undergo a severe ordeal and that a serious misfortune will befall him and he must cling to God. He does not fall and fall, God forbid. But if the dreamer sees in his dream that he is swimming safely in the sea and suddenly dies, this indicates that the dreamer will die as a witness, and God knows best. But if the dreamer sees himself entering the sea and the sky is raining, this means that the dreamer will be affected by a great calamity, and God knows best. The greatest and most knowledgeable. The dream of drinking sea water indicates ample and abundant food for the pioneer in the near future, God willing. In the event that you see a lot of strange fish in the sea in a dream, this means that there are many people around the insight, but they do not wish him well, but rather want to catch Interpretation of seeing the seashore in a dream: If the dreamer sees in his dream beach sand and that he is swimming in it, this means that the dreamer is suffering from many problems, obstacles, and fears in his life, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. While the dreamer sees in his dream that he is only sitting on the beach, this means that the dreamer will have access to The opportunity to travel that he desired and that he will achieve many of the dreams and goals that he was striving to achieve. As for the dreamer’s vision of sleeping on the sand of the sea, this is an indication that the dreamer desires to marry or become involved if he has not been married before, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation Dream of a Calm SeaCommentators believe that seeing a calm sea in a dream has many meanings, including: If the fortuneteller is not married, then the calm of the sea indicates stability in work and the success it achieves, and it is an indication of the strength, resolve and resolve that God has in achieving His goals by God’s command. If Whether the dreamer is married or married, a dream of a calm sea indicates that the dreamer enjoys love and stability in his family life and that his home has a lot of love and affection, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for a calm sea in a pregnant woman’s dream, it indicates ease and ease of childbirth by the command of God Almighty, and God The highest and most knowledgeable. Interpretations of a dream about a stormy sea. Interpretation scholars have gathered to interpret the meaning of a stormy sea in a dream. It is not a vision worthy of praise because it indicates many worries and sorrows that the dreamer will face.

title: Interpretation of a dream about swimming according to Ibn Sirin 2021

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about swimming by Ibn Sirin: Swimming is considered one of the beautiful sports that has many benefits, and Al-Ahly must teach swimming to their children from a young age because it is a sport that has many benefits for the body and it is also an enjoyable sport, especially in the summer with high temperatures. Sometimes when a person sleeps, he dreams that he is swimming, so what does this dream mean? Today and even today, we will find different interpretations of the dream of swimming in a dream by Ibn Sirin. What are the interpretations of this dream follow us. Interpretation of the dream of swimming in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The scholar Ibn Sirin generally interpreted swimming in a dream as a good thing. So dreaming about swimming shows something good, as it can indicate success, whether it is in a love relationship, in studies, or in other fields. If one dreams that he is swimming in a pool, this indicates the family and social ties of that dreamer, and it also indicates wealth Swimming, especially if it is easy, also indicates the strong bond between the family, the abundance of food, and the abundance of food and wealth. Swimming in turbid and dirty water is evidence of problems in the life of the fortuneteller. Interpretation of a dream about swimming according to Ibn Sirin for a single girl: If an unmarried girl dreams For a married woman to swim in dirty water, this means that her partner is not serious with her and that he is confusing her and she may have a wrong relationship with him. Swimming in general means for the beloved girl, so if the water is clear and she swims easily in the dream, her love life will be happy and free of problems, but if she swims with difficulty This indicates the presence of problems in her emotional life. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is swimming in fresh water, this indicates the presence of someone who loves and adores her and wants to marry her. Interpretation of a dream about swimming by Ibn Sirin for a married woman: A dream about swimming for a married woman indicates her relationship with a man. . Disagreements between her and her husband. If a married woman dreams that she is swimming in the sea and returns to the beach, this means that she depends on the man in the affairs of her life, whether he is her father, brother, or husband. Interpretation of a dream about swimming according to Ibn Sirin for a pregnant woman: A dream about a pregnant woman swimming indicates In impure water, it indicates that her husband is cheating on her, and it may also indicate the husband’s abandonment and divorce, or the loss and death of the husband. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is swimming easily, this means that her due date is approaching and that her birth will be smooth and easy. However, if she dreams that she is swimming with difficulty, this means that Childbirth will be difficult. Interpretation of a dream about swimming by Ibn Sirin for a man: If a man dreams that he is swimming, this indicates travel or success, advancement in work, and earning a lot of money. A man who swims in fresh water indicates that he will get a lot of money and that he will get a lot of good things. And that his relationship with his wife is strong and stable if he swims easily. If a young man sees himself swimming easily in a dream, this indicates the approaching date of his engagement and marriage. A young man who swims in sea water indicates that he will marry a beautiful girl and that he will be in complete agreement with her and that she will be a faithful wife.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a person who shot himself in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams: He shot himself in a dream. In case you are looking for an interpretation of a dream about shooting himself in a dream, and we found that it is one of the dreams that some people want to know the interpretation of, let us get to know the interpretations of the scholarly work for this dream, and the reader must know that the site managers do not provide interpretations, but They are from the heart. Interpretations of some scholars. Interpretation of a dream of being shot by a bullet in a dream: Hitting someone with bullets in a dream may mean that he will fall into something very dangerous at that time and will have to ask God for help. If one sees himself being shot, this may indicate weakness that he suffered from The dreamer is in his life at that time. If one sees that he is hitting himself with bullets, this may indicate a dangerous confrontation that the dreamer will face in his life during those days. Dreaming of being hit by bullets in the dream may indicate the dreamer’s need to rely on himself during this time to get rid of the period. The difficulty he goes through in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about being hit in the face with a shoe in a dream: In the event that the dream hits the face with shoes, this may indicate harm that may happen to the dreamer in his workplace during this period. Hitting the face with a shoe in a dream may indicate some The problems that the dreamer faces during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that a dream about being hit in the face with a shoe indicates that the dreamer has turned away from God, Blessed and Most High, and needs to repent and return to God Almighty. If someone sees that he was hitting his face with a shoe, there are some difficulties. Which the dreamer faces in his life in those days, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams of the oppressor beating the oppressed in a dream. The strike of the oppressed against the oppressor may indicate the abundant good that the dreamer reaps during this time. In the case of dreaming that the oppressor defeats the oppressed in a dream, this may indicate distress that The dreamer will fall into it during this period, and God knows best. Seeing the oppressor hitting the oppressed in a dream may indicate problems that the dreamer may suffer from in his life during those days. Seeing the oppressor hitting the oppressed in a dream may mean that the dreamer will be exposed to a major problem during this time and therefore To ask God for help. Interpretation of a dream about a student hitting his teacher in a dream. Anyone who sees in a dream that the student was hitting the teacher may indicate corruption in life that the dreamer is carrying out and must stop. Hitting the teacher in a dream may indicate a crisis that the dreamer fell into during this Time, and God knows best. It is possible to see the student hitting the teacher in a dream, which indicates some pressures that the dreamer faces during this time. Seeing the teacher knocking in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s need to get some advice to help you get through this stage, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about giving a military salute in a dream. The military salute in a dream may indicate the psychological peace that the dreamer feels during those days. If one sees himself giving a military salute, this may indicate the growth and development that is occurring in the life of the dreamer, thanks to God. It may mean See

title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Seeing snakes in a dream portends harm to the viewer, except for a pregnant woman. If a man sees in his dream that he is killing a snake, this indicates comfort and the cessation of problems and worries, and if the dreamer sees in a dream that a snake is attacking him, this means that the seer suffers from many problems and we will. I will show you the interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in detail in this article on the summit website. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream by Ibn Sirin has several interpretations that we will present to you. If a person sees a snake in his dream and is afraid of it, this indicates that there are some problems in the dreamer's life and he cannot overcome them. If a person sees a snake in his dream, but is not afraid of it, this is evidence that this person has the determination, will and ability to get rid of his problems. If the dreamer sees a snake in his house in a dream, this indicates the envy of his relatives and that he should not trust him and be safe for all people. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Seeing a snake in a dream from Al-Nabulsi indicates the presence of a person who hates him and his life. Seeing a snake attacking someone indicates the presence of a person near you who does not wish you well. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he has a snake, this indicates that he will obtain a great position. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees many snakes in a dream, this means that the people around her are planning many From her plans and schemes and she must be careful. And if a married woman sees a snake inside her house and attacks her family, this indicates that there is a woman who wants to marry her husband and break up her family, but she tries as much as possible to protect her family. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl dreams that she is killing a white snake, this indicates that there is a person proposing to her. And if she also sees that she is killing a white snake, this indicates that her romantic relationship will fail. And if an unmarried girl sees a snake in her dream that she is not afraid of, this indicates that there is a malicious and bad-tempered friend in her life who is jealous of her. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees a snake in her dream, this is considered a good vision for her. If a pregnant woman sees a snake sitting on her bed, this indicates that her birth will be easy. And the dream of a woman carrying a large snake indicates that God will grant her a male child. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a divorced woman Interpretation of a dream of a snake for a divorced woman If it attacks her, this indicates that she will face all her problems and get rid of them. And if a divorced woman sees in her dream that she got rid of From a snake, this indicates the successes that you will achieve. Interpretation of seeing a snake in a dream for a man Interpretation of a man’s dream of a large snake shows someone who hates and persecutes him, but he does not know him, and this is a warning. And if a man sees in a dream black and large snakes in his house, and he is not afraid of them, this indicates that there are people from his relatives waiting for him and do not want him to improve. Interpretation

title: Interpretation of seeing a dear person traveling in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a trip for someone you love. A trip that symbolizes moving. How to find the adventure begins in Kom Tareek. It also indicates ambition and a bright future. When we dream that a loved one is traveling, this is a sign of his great love in the dreamer’s heart. Perhaps this indicates his constant interest in him and his affairs. Seeing a man traveling abroad When a man dreams that he says he is traveling To a place other than his country, and this is evidence of his ambitions and goals that he seeks to achieve. If he sees that he has traveled and arrived in the new city, this is a sign of his success in achieving its goals. But if he finds that this is not enough, then it is evidence of the failure of his efforts in achieving his goals. A man dreamed of traveling within the country. Whoever dreams that he is traveling from the government to another person in the same country in which he lives announces his place of work. Whoever is able to travel and reach the place designated for him indicates that he will be promoted in his job as a result of his efforts. As for someone who fails to arrive, it is a failure to succeed at work. Interpretation of a vision about travel and walking. Whoever dreams He travels in his sleep, but rather walks on his feet and passes through the markets, which is an indication that he carries an order around his neck that he must fulfill. Perhaps the dream indicates that there is a large debt on the dreamer who is unable to pay it. The meaning of seeing traveling barefoot. As for whoever sees himself walking barefoot, this indicates His closeness to God Almighty. It also indicates that a righteous man fears God in his family. And in the event that you see yourself traveling with a limp, this is a sign of losing half of the money. The meaning of a dream about traveling for a pregnant womanTraveling in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of childbirth. Who saw it begin? He brings a white colored travel bag and it appears that Childbirth is easy, God willing. What if the color of the bag is blue? This indicates the difficulty of childbirth, and God knows best. If the clothes in the bag are new because it indicates the health and safety of the fetus. But if it is old - old - old - elderly, and if it is not clear, this indicates the presence of health problems. For the fetus, and she must go to the doctor who follows her in order to be reassured. Interpretation of a dream about someone she loves traveling in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of travel in a dream is one of the very important interpretations that concerns every girl after seeing this particular dream. Interpretation of the vision: Dear traveler, for the unmarried girl and this person was Happy and happy to travel, this dream is a sign of the good that an unmarried girl will receive. An unmarried girl will get a lot of sustenance that she longs for. Dream InterpretationDear Traveling, but his appearance sad is an unpleasant dream, because it indicates many problems that the girl will face The unmarried woman in the future. This vision indicates that the dreamer is surrounded by many problems in the future, but he must think wisely and rationally. Interpretation of the dream of the person you love traveling to the singles. Seeing a single girl in her dream that there is someone close to her and they love to travel is evidence that everything will be solved. This person's problems and that he will live a decent life full of health, happiness and stability. God will give this man a lot of goodness, he will get the support he asked for and his life will develop for the better. Perhaps God will bring the two peoples closer to goodness soon. Must...

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving dead green grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin -

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about giving dead green grapes in a dream by Ibn Sirin - Interpretation of his dream about giving dead green grapes in a dream, which basically conveys the praiseworthy humanity of the dreamer, as the grapes show the beautiful things that the visionary or wondrous person will witness. During the coming period, many people searched for the interpretation of the dream of giving dead green grapes in a dream to Ibn Sirin. We will also provide you in this article with information about what is the interpretation of the dream of a dead person eating grapes. The interpretation of the dream that he gives dead green grapes to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of seeing grapes? Green in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about grapes for married people? What is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person eating grapes? The interpretation of seeing grapes in a dream is a sign of the permanent spread of glaucoma in the body. When we eat grapes in season, this indicates achieving good deeds in this world and blue with the best women, children and money. When Noah was afflicted with tuberculosis, God Almighty inspired him to eat grapes, and God healed him after eating them. Interpretation of the dream of giving dead green grapes to Ibn Sirin. It is stated in the interpretation of the scholar Ibn Sirin in the interpretation of the dream that the dead person is given green grapes. A group of interpretations is that when the sick person sees green grapes in his dream, he is given For the deceased, this indicates a quick recovery from green grapes. illness. He suffers from death, because this is one of the signs of prayer and charity that will reach God, and it interprets the dream of a dead person eating grapes in the dreamer’s dream. What is the interpretation of seeing green grapes in a dream? Eating green grapes in a dream indicates that the dreamer will obtain a lot of good and great sustenance that The dreamer will acquire it in the near future, and the vision indicates that one of the relatives will have good offspring, God willing, and that he will have goodness in his marriage. And life, and God Almighty will provide them with their first offspring, and this is their offspring, and God Almighty knows best. What is the interpretation of a dream about grapes for a married woman? The interpretation of a dream about grapes for a married woman comes to the ability and abundance that will come to her, and the married woman is in love with her husband, and the interpretation of the dream is based on a number of factors, such as: the situation in which he was It includes the person who had the vision and the time in which the vision occurred. It is known that there are many dreams that bring good news and an interpretation that indicates goodness for their owner, and at the end of this article we learned what is the interpretation of a dream about a dead person eating grapes, the interpretation of the dream. By giving a dead person green grapes according to Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of seeing green grapes in a dream? What is the interpretation of a dream about grapes for a married woman?

title: Interpretation of dreams about fear of drowning in the sea in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fear of drowning in the sea in a dream. You are asking what does the interpretation of a dream about fear of drowning in the sea in a dream mean? We present in the following lines all of this and more details.. Interpretation of dreams about fear of drowning in the sea in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about fear of drowning in the sea in a dream. A dream can be a sign of repentance from sins, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a single girl sees a fear of drowning, it can be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees a fear of drowning in a dream, it may be a sign of fear and sadness that has no place there, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about surviving drowning in a river in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about surviving drowning in a river in a dream can be a sign of goodness, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees himself being saved from drowning in the river, he can express justice, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees salvation from Drowning can lead to repentance of sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If a married woman sees that she has been saved from drowning, this may be a sign of paying off debts, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of drowning in water and emerging from it in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of drowning in water and emerging from it in a dream can be It is a sign of recovery from an illness, and God knows the unseen. When you see yourself drowning in water and coming out of it, this can lead to getting rid of problems, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In a dream, it emerges from the water, so this may be a sign that it is getting rid of crises, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream of flooding the bedroom in a dream: Interpretation of a dream about the bedroom sinking in a dream could be a sign of anxiety, and God knows the unseen, while if the dreamer sees the house drowning without any effect on Dreaming, this may be evidence of the goodness that he will attain, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself drowning without consequence or danger, this may lead to goodness, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself drowning in a dream, this may be a sign of goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream Flooding the streets with water in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about flooding the streets with water in a dream could be a sign of choices that require patience, and God knows the unseen. When you see water in the streets, some enemies may attack you, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees water in the streets from rain in a dream, it may be a sign of sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If The dreamer saw himself swimming in water in the streets, as this may lead to mistreatment by the arrogant ruler, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of a car sinking in the rain in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of a car sinking in the rain in a dream Scientists have not given specific meanings to seeing this. However, seeing a car sinking in a dream It could be a sign of haste, and God knows best. When a single girl sees a sinking car in a dream, this may indicate wrong decisions, and God knows the unseen. When she sees a part of the car lost, this may be a sign of loss.

title: Interpretation of a dream about pepper: seeing green, red, and black peppers in a dream

preview.html: Dreaming of pepper in a dream for an unmarried girl and a married woman about a bearer of green pepper according to Ibn Sirin, cold picking pepper, cutting sweet pepper. Interpretation of pepper in a dream. It indicates goodness, health and money. In his interpretation, he is a man who is honest in speech and effective in work. Green pepper is good luck and red is anger or Emotional jealousy or difficult life phase. Seeing pepper in general, it is money and very good. Seeing pepper for manufacturers and merchants is a quick profit and also keeps the money of halal trade. Seeing pepper for ordinary people has a good reputation. Seeing pepper for married men means preserving the family and sacrificing for the survival of the family. General reunification. Seeing pepper for one person indicates that he is on the right path in his behavior and life. When seeing pepper for a religious person, he will gain the satisfaction of Almighty God by doing good. Seeing pepper for a working woman means discipline and sobriety. Seeing pepper for a non-working woman is her steadfastness and stubbornness in the face of difficulties In her life. For a married woman to see pepper is concern for her home and God’s right to it. Seeing pepper for single women indicates a good psychological state and a feeling of love for those around them. Seeing yourself eating pepper is not a good thing. Seeing yourself grinding green pepper indicates marriage. Whoever sees himself eating pepper In poisonous water, or falling into a poor task, it is said that he gains the honor of money from fatigue, and pepper has a lot of money if it is not eaten. Pepper in a dream indicates the good reputation of the fortuneteller. Green pepper in a dream symbolizes money and nourishment. For a single man, seeing Pepper means that he is walking on the path of righteousness in his life. As for pepper in a woman’s dream, it means that she has a serious and successful personality in her work. Interpretation of pepper in a man’s dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is buying or eating pepper, will have great wealth in livelihood and profit. And red pepper in a dream A man can symbolize a person with a sharp character who is difficult to deal with. Interpretation of pepper in one’s dream. Green pepper in anyone’s dream symbolizes luck in the practical and emotional fields. It symbolizes the heart of a kind or generous person. Whoever sees that he buys green pepper, eats it, or prepares food with it, he Hits or achieves a goal. If she sees ripe peppers in her house, many good things will come or good news will knock on her door. Hot green peppers in a single woman’s dream are good luck, while cold or sweet peppers are good news. If a woman appears in her dream, green peppers bring good luck to Emotional and professional level. If an unmarried woman saw that she was buying pepper in a dream, this is a positive sign that her wish will come true. As for fresh pepper, it is good for unmarried women. While sweet pepper predicts that the unmarried woman will hear the happy news in reality. Interpretation of pepper in A dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees that she is buying pepper from the market, then this brings goodness to her home. If she sees that she is putting pepper in food or using it in cooking, then she interprets this as a source of good livelihood or a source of rice.
